Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: A laughing person merrily asks a happy and laughing person various things that can make them laugh. Similarly a crying person asks another crying person matters that causes crying.

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: A settled person will share with another settled person means of settling down. A person treading a path will ask another on the right path, things that would lead one to the right path.

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: A worldly person asks the other worldly persons various aspects of worldly affairs. One who studies Vedas would ask about Vedas from another who has the knowledge of Vedas.
